meanings.definition: A type of palm tree native to the Caribbean.
meanings.sent1: The grugru swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful grugru tree on my trip to the Caribbean.
meanings.sent3: The parrot perched on the grugru tree and sang a cheerful tune.
meanings.sent4: The grugru tree stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the grugru tree rustled softly in the wind.

meanings.definition: A small, hard-shelled nut from the grugru palm tree.
meanings.sent1: She cracked open the grugru to reveal the tasty nut inside.
meanings.sent2: The grugru nut was a popular snack among the locals.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored the grugru nut in its secret stash.
meanings.sent4: The grugru nut was as tough as a little warrior.
meanings.sent5: The grugru nut rolled off the table and onto the floor.

meanings.definition: A type of necklace made from grugru nuts.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful grugru necklace to the party.
meanings.sent2: The grugru necklace shimmered in the candlelight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey tried to snatch the grugru necklace.
meanings.sent4: The grugru necklace was a symbol of friendship and love.
meanings.sent5: The grugru necklace clinked softly as she danced.
